english.segment1: V1: We're the ones who. believe in the things unseen. This home, this body is. the in-between
english.segment2: We're the ones who fight. down on our knees. Who dare to love our enemies (love enemies)
english.segment3: Chorus: They say it sounds insane. we say that we've been changed. By the power of crazy love
english.segment4: This world, it looks at us. like we're ridiculous. Baby it's all because of crazy love
english.segment5: V2: We're the ones gonna put. it all in reveres. Gonna die to ourselves, gonna live to serve
english.segment6: Cuz' when ya get what ya. when you walk by faith. Is it really so dumb to give. it all away (give it all away)
english.segment7: Chorus: They say it sounds insane. we say that we've been changed. By the power of crazy love
english.segment8: This world, it looks at us. like we're ridiculous. Baby it's all because of crazy love
english.segment10: Bridge: We know it sounds absurd, we don't get what we deserve
english.segment11: It's by grace we are saved!
english.segment12: Chorus: They say it sounds insane. we say that we've been changed. By the power of crazy love
english.segment13: This world, it looks at us. like we're ridiculous. Baby it's all because of crazy love
english.segment17: We're the ones who. believer in the things unseen
english.segment18: This home, this body is. the in-between
english.segment19: We're the ones who fight. down on our knees
english.segment20: Who dare to love our. enemies
english.segment21: We're the ones gonna put. it all in reverse
english.segment22: Gonna die to ourselves, gonna live to serve
